title: About to play Rammus vs Zed, Draven, Nasus, and Kha'Zix.
body:
Prediction: I'll spend 15K to stay alive.
They'll spend 2.3K to laugh at me.

What actually happened: I spent 12.2K to stay alive. {{item:3725}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3260}} 
They each spent 2.3K to laugh at me. And Kha'Zix had a black cleaver tacked on.
